name: SIMCardNetworkPreferencesPut
description:
This API allows setting or updating a SIM card network preference.

Every SIM card has default network preferences defined on Telnyx. These preferences will determine how a SIMCard will connect to the network by considering a list of preferable operators.

There can be multiple scenarios where an operator can be preferred over another, for example, when a specific mobile operator can provide better network latency or better pricing.

mobile_operator_networks_preferences.description: A list of mobile operator networks and the priority that should be applied when the SIM is connecting to the network.

mobile_operator_network_id.description: The mobile operator network resource identification UUID.

priority.description: It determines what is the priority of a specific operator network that should be assumed by a SIM card when connecting to a network. The highest priority is 0, the second highest is 1 and so on.

$ul: **created_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating when the resource was created.
**mobile_operator_networks_preferences**: A list of mobile operator networks and the priority that should be applied when the SIM is connecting to the network.
**updated_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating when the resource was updated.
